lead_paragraph: Based on the Newbery Awardr-Winning Novel Misty of Chincoteague by Marguerite Henry.On an island off the Virginia coast lives a centuries-old band of wild ponies.  Among them is the mysterious Phantom, a rarely seen mare that eludes all efforts
snippet: Based on the Newbery Awardr-Winning Novel Misty of Chincoteague by Marguerite Henry.On an island off the Virginia coast lives a centuries-old band of wild ponies.  Among them is the mysterious Phantom, a rarely seen mare that eludes all efforts
